text:
What about fixing the one [here](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/master/nilearn/plotting/slicers.py#L311) while you are at it? The "in absolute value" is missing I think.

Note that there is no 'auto' threshold logic to add_overlay so it should be removed from the docstring.
